description: Grants permission to get details of a designated service membership.

parameters.name: membershipId
parameters.description: Required element for GetMembership to identify the membership ID to query.

nested_items.name: membershipId
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the queried membership ID.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured account for managing the membership.

nested_items.name: region
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured region for managing the membership.

nested_items.name: membershipName
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership name.

nested_items.name: membershipArn
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the membership ARN.

nested_items.name: membershipStatus
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the current membership status.

nested_items.name: membershipActivationTimestamp
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership activation timestamp.

nested_items.name: membershipDeactivationTimestamp
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership name deactivation timestamp.

nested_items.name: customerType
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership type. Options include Standalone | Organizations.

nested_items.name: numberOfAccountsCovered
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the number of accounts in the membership.

nested_items.name: incidentResponseTeam
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the configured membership incident response team members.

nested_items.name: optInFeatures
nested_items.description: Response element for GetMembership that provides the if opt-in features have been enabled.
